message: "To be able to remove that marker off that young victim of sexual trafficking, I think, exponentially speeds up their transformation and recovery."

data.description: A San Jose tattoo removal program that has removed around 2,000 former gang members' tattoos over the years is being expanded to assist victims of human trafficking who have been "branded" with…
data.title: San Jose tattoo removal program expands to include 'branded' victims of human trafficking
